title: Imgur Spiral Watch Face
summary: Tell time with the Imgur Spiral as your watchface! All hail the hypnospiral!
description: Are you stuck waiting for the rest of your day to load? Accent your anticipation with the spiral-shaped Imgur loading icon watchface! With our watchface app, you can tell time using our loading arcs or bring up a digital watchface in the middle of the outer two rings. We can't guarantee this watchface will make your workday go by faster, but we have it on good authority that time flies when you're on imgur.com. Imgur Spiral Watchface supports multiple screen shapes and types, so it's perfect for droids both square and round. Beep bop boop.Thanks to @AntonChristensen for creating our famous loading spiral icon and @jstnthms for pioneering “timegur,” which inspired this watchface. You da real MVPs.We’d love to hear from you! Review us in the Play Store or reach out to us directly (we won't bite):Email: mobilefeedback@imgur.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/imgurTwitter: https://twitter.com/imgurPinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/imgur/Instagram: https://instagram.com/imgur/Tumblr: http://imgur.tumblr.com/
descriptionHTML:
Are you stuck waiting for the rest of your day to load? Accent your anticipation with the spiral-shaped Imgur loading icon watchface! With our watchface app, you can tell time using our loading arcs or bring up a digital watchface in the middle of the outer two rings. We can't guarantee this watchface will make your workday go by faster, but we have it on good authority that time flies when you're on imgur.com.

Imgur Spiral Watchface supports multiple screen shapes and types, so it's perfect for droids both square and round. Beep bop boop.

Thanks to @AntonChristensen for creating our famous loading spiral icon and @jstnthms for pioneering “timegur,” which inspired this watchface. You da real MVPs.

We’d love to hear from you! Review us in the Play Store or reach out to us directly (we won't bite):

Email: mobilefeedback@imgur.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/imgur
Twitter: https://twitter.com/imgur
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/imgur/
Instagram: https://instagram.com/imgur/
Tumblr: http://imgur.tumblr.com/
comments: What is this? It didn't work on my device (Nitro A311). Installation was successful, but no icon was created on homescreen and in app drawer. In playstore also, after installtion, there is only option to uninstall it, option to open it is not available.
Looks cool! Works on my Huawei watch just fine. I can't see how to add the digital time in the middle like the picture though.
No one seems to understand this is for a smartwatch and not your phone. This doesn't work if you don't have a smart watch (obviously) so ignore all the bad reviews
Man it must be difficult for a dev with a low rating for no reason other then people just not reading what the are downloading.
Looks ok. Need to get rid of second circle,  as it gets stuck in ambient mode, so it looks off.
How How do I start this? It makes no sense. I can't even open it.
recentChanges: Initial release of the Imgur Spiral Watch Face.
